featured.text: Scared straight out of your chair?
Carved from large, straight trees and painted vibrant colors, the totem poles are not just unique works of art.
They have heavy and straight tree trunks.
Upon closer examination, de Mestral observed that the burrs, which appeared straight to the naked eye, actually contained many small hooks that clung firmly to the loops in the fabric of his pants.
The trunk of redwood trees is very stout and usually forms a single straight column.

definition.zh_def: 直的，沒有彎曲或曲折的。
definition.en_def: Extending or moving in a straight line; not curved or bent.
definition.example: She walked straight to the store without stopping.
